title: Rakan's voice is... not what I expected.

embed.description: This is the voice for the new Champion Rakan in English. Purchase RP via Amazon (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO For League of Legends Related News Check Out Surrender@20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/ Feel Free to Follow me on Twitter as well: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights

replies.body: couldn't last 10 seconds

> [{quoted}](name=Big Lincoln,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wBYy9Vmq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-04T19:38:50.265+0000)
>
> couldn't last 10 seconds

For someone named "The Charmer" he doesn't sound very charming tbh.
i think that's the joke. he's cocky and ostentatious - which is sort of like a cockatoo

If you can charm people with magic, you don't need a good voice (or personality).

God It feels like a less aggressive Kled.
first thing I thought of: MUSHUUU

> [{quoted}](name=Big Lincoln,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wBYy9Vmq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-04T19:38:50.265+0000)
>
> couldn't last 10 seconds

skip to the 3 minute mark and his voice changes pretty significantly to something more like what you'd expect
it's weird

> [{quoted}](name=Quepha,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wBYy9Vmq,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-04-04T19:49:39.205+0000)
>
> skip to the 3 minute mark and his voice changes pretty significantly to something more like what you'd expect
> it's weird

Huh.

Doesn't sound that bad. Could be better though imo. 

The beginning must be his dashing VO's then I guess?
I'm 17 minutes in. I'm fucking laughing.
Both his and Xayah's voices sound like they would fit in a movie set in a cheesy high school movie.

yeaaa

and the fact that they have lines towards eachother and they call eachother hun/darling/baby is making me love them even more i didnt think interactions with champs could get this good it works and they have a line where its like

Xayah: i love you
Rakan: i know 

Star wars approves

Now I understand why they're together.

Nobody else can stand the sound of their voices.

EDIT: With all due respect, Riot, everything else, from design to abilities to concept was so good, and now this.

> [{quoted}](name=Blood Magicks,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wBYy9Vmq,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-04-04T19:44:00.602+0000)
>
> Now I understand why they're together.
> 
> Nobody else can stand the sound of their voices.

I just heard Xayah's voice and....

All I can say is that her voice reminds me of pre-rework Katarina's VO.

So edgy.

I don't mind Xayah's voice. It goes well with the "rebel" theme. Rakan's voice sounds annoying to me when he is yelling but its not bad when he is talking normally. When i saw him I kinda expected him to have a voice like Kuzco from the Emperors New Groove lol idk why.

> [{quoted}](name=Penta Ace,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wBYy9Vmq,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2017-04-04T20:04:17.397+0000)
>
> I don't mind Xayah's voice. It goes well with the "rebel" theme. Rakan's voice sounds annoying to me when he is yelling but its not bad when he is talking normally. When i saw him I kinda expected him to have a voice like Kuzco from the Emperors New Groove lol idk why.

That would've been dope tbh.

I'm in fucking LOVE with both of their VOs, flaws and all.  

And let's be honest, these two are the April and Andy of League now.

X: Someone is going to die...
R: Of fun!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Whitakker,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wBYy9Vmq,comment-id=002d,timestamp=2017-04-04T21:43:26.678+0000)
>
> I'm in fucking LOVE with both of their VOs, flaws and all.  
> 
> And let's be honest, these two are the April and Andy of League now.
> 
> X: Someone is going to die...
> R: Of fun!!!

;)
THAT IS ALL I CAN SEE NOW WHY.
Woah what the fuck. I was expecting suave, not Kevin Hart.

Their  dialogue together is actually pretty good.  They bicker with each other damn near like a married couple. It's actually quite accurate lol. 
 

Though, I think the voice fits their personality. Not everyone is full of  vibrate personalities and Xayah does come off like a stressed out cocky apathetic bitch and well . . . people like that exist. 

Just the same as people like Rakan exist. 

Though, I think it's interesting because the overall tone + personality of their voices drastically change when they're duoed together, and when they're solo.  You can tell they're much happier/more vibrant when in lanes together and when they're with other supports they have entirely different dialogue like they're bored and don't want to be there and seem overly annoyed. 

From a story + personality perspective this makes sense because people are drastically more different when solo/with strangers than they are with people they're strongly attached to. So, with all of that said . . . the voice acting is quite accurate contrary to other's opinions.

Yo, it's the Kled dilemma again, where his most bombastic voice lines are front-loaded into these audio dumps because of how Riot labels their files. The soundbites from 2 minutes onward are much more subdued and actually fit how Rakan looks.
Yep.     The lines are alphabetically arranged by the type of trigger.

They sound a bit more 'earthly' than I expected. That is, their lingo and dialect seems more like something straight out of our society rather than a culture of magical, half-human bird people. (Why do Runeterrans also call their significant others 'baby', and what are the odds of that considering they live on an entirely different planet from us within an entirely different social environment?)

> [{quoted}](name=Valor Bot,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wBYy9Vmq,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2017-04-04T20:00:18.474+0000)
>
> They sound a bit more 'earthly' than I expected. That is, their lingo and dialect seems more like something straight out of our society rather than a culture of magical, half-human bird people.

I agree. 

I honestly felt like I was going to hear the word "fam" at one point.

Rakan's voice is pretty terrible. I was kinda enthralled by him, but that never in this game have I ever been so turned off of a character by a VO as hard as his. Ugh. He was so pretty, his kit looks so cool. He just sounds absolutely batshit terrible. He's not charming, he's fucking obnoxious. I am so disappointed that Riot ruined such an elegant character with such a terrible VO.
I was expecting a soothsayer; if a bit flashy. Something along the lines of a male ahri with hints of aurelion Sol, NOT kled x ekko

I felt about the same for Xayah. When I saw her I was expecting something with elegance, kinda similar to Ahri but probably more fierce, when I saw her title was The Rebel I was expecting her to be all into a legitimate cause.

Then she turned out to be an anarchist bomb-throwing meme-spewing teenager who sounds like she spends her mornings angrily posting on Twitter.

Yeahno.

She even has the Hot Topic girl nose ring going on. Like fuckin LOL. I love her design and everything tbh, but fucking LOL. They really knew who they were targeting with her and Im guessing it's gonna win big time.

> [{quoted}](name=Placentas,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wBYy9Vmq,comment-id=002200010000,timestamp=2017-04-04T22:27:46.441+0000)
>
> She even has the Hot Topic girl nose ring going on. Like fuckin LOL. I love her design and everything tbh, but fucking LOL. They really knew who they were targeting with her and Im guessing it's gonna win big time.

The hot topic girl nose ring has been around in several cultures long before it became the hot topic girl nose ring. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Literally biggest fuckboy of 2017 lol

The first minute or two is him using his ultimate. You can tell by his voicelines that he's trying to distract them, which is what he does in the story, while Xayah moves in. The rest of his voicelines make a lot more sense.

Imagine the reactions If they were gay couples.

People would lose their shit, and say ''children play this game'', ''It wasn't necessary'', ''I thought we were done with SJW bullshits'', ''Politics, here we go again.'' ''This is just a MOBA game, we don't need sexuality and romance, nobody gives a fuck''. etc.

I mean, they probably will lose their shit anyway, as Riot said they will confirm at least one gay champion in story. But the sad thing is, people don't even give a fuck about them while a big part of their theme is their romance and they will be always remembered by their love. It is by far the biggest couple officially shown by Riot. Everything about them smells love. Recall, Splash Art, Quotes, Synergy and probably Story.

THIS IS TOTALLY NOT A BAD THING THOUGH.

I actually love it and I'm excited about their relationship.

I'm complaning about community, not Riot. Riot is one of the most friendly companies I ever seen.

But can you see how will people react to confirmed gay champion in a story, even while It will high likely be confirmed by just a few words, rather than compare to Xayah and Rakan?

I would like to see people who said sentences above toward me in the past. It would be better to know that I may be wrong about them and they not are hypocrites as I think.

But no.

> People would lose their shit

i think it is more correct to say that people will not give a shit

aside from a bunch of jerks on both sides of the debate for whom this is an incredibly important talking point to shove down everybody's throat shouting look at me look at me.

> [{quoted}](name=Aptest,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wBYy9Vmq,comment-id=000b0001,timestamp=2017-04-04T20:03:49.221+0000)
>
> i think it is more correct to say that people will not give a shit

Nah, I think you would hear more backlash, just because people who don't really care about it aren't going to say anything. 

That's not to say that most people would hate it, it's just they'd probably be more vocal about it.

people will be vocal if riot took taric and said : "this guy is gay" or "this guy is straight" in everybody's faces.

these new chumps? they are new. a blank slate. nobody cares.

What people don't like:
Rewriting old things to fit a (real or perceived) political agenda (See: Marvel's horrible SJW comic sales).

The ironic thing about that is that DC is doing so much better than Marvel right now (comic-wise at least) and yet they're way better at diversity. Just goes to show that these things don't really need to be forced.

I personally see this as needless complaining however. They ARENT a gay couple nor do we have a cemented gay couple.

So its basically getting angry over something you fabricated. Its pointless.

> [{quoted}](name=Skorch,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wBYy9Vmq,comment-id=000b0002,timestamp=2017-04-04T20:55:14.593+0000)
>
> I personally see this as needless complaining however. They ARENT a gay couple nor do we have a cemented gay couple.
> 
> So its basically getting angry over something you fabricated. Its pointless.

No It is not coming nowhere. I already explained.

Their love is so intense and they are not like other official couples. Their quotes, their splash art, their recall. Most of their things are affected by their relationship, their love. Which was supposed to be a ''what about no'' case for people who made the argument of ''We don't need sexuality and love in a MOBA game.'' (I must remind you, this argument was only shown in LGBT threads.)

I don't see them.

My complain is, If you are actually homophobic but don't want to look like one, stop it and be yourself. Excuses just make you more pathetic. (to make it specific, you pronoun is not used toward actual you).

Remember me If Riot ever releases a gay couple. This can be fun. :P
We already have a Bi champion, so it wouldn't surprise me :b
They implied that Vi was one, but that's not an actual confirmation. Is there someone else?
Taric, Taric is confirmed to be in love with Ezreal, and he flirts with Diana.  He's bi.

> Taric, Taric is confirmed to be in love with Ezreal

Riiiiight
Didn't know he is black...

I also kinda feel like some of Rakan's lines are the pent of fury of all the supports and their crave for recognition and equality. 

His voice is like the voice of supports in all the ways that I can't put into words

Oh my God this is not what I expected.
2:02 is what all of his voice should sound like IMO
DID I JUST FUCKING HEAR AN ARCHER "DANGER ZONE" REFERENCE!!! im done. i gotta play him now.

Their interaction between each other is hilarious, they act like a real couple.

Althought I wonder how the shared quotes will work, do they have to stand close to each other in order to trigger them? If so, what distance?
so roster and hyperactive, fitting of a highly mobile champion and definitely of a charmer dancer (clearly not a singer)

He kinda reminds me of a more flamboyant Flynn Rinder from Tangled.

Edit: Much more flamboyant

He's overconfident.

I feel like it'll grow on people.
